recipe.title: Fresh Tomato-Olive Sauce
ingredients: 1 1/2 pounds plum tomatoes, cored, cut lengthwise into thin wedges
1/2 cup diced roasted red or yellow bell peppers from jar
instructions: Combine all ingredients in large bowl; sprinkle with salt and pepper. Let stand at room temperature at least 1 hour and up to 2 hours to allow flavors to blend. Season to taste with salt and pepper.
